Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print(instance) wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local Character local Player local Torso local Humanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local Fanged_BoolValue = waitForChild(Tool, "Fanged") local Fang_Weld = waitForChild(Tool, "FangWeld") local Fire_Part = waitForChild(Sword, "FirePart") local Fang_Fire = waitForChild(Fire_Part, "DarkFire")
local Damage = 16
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local NumSpiders = 8 local AnansiId = 117508233 local Anansi = Game:GetService('InsertService'):LoadAsset(AnansiId):GetChildren()[1]
local function Cut(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and Humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if Fang_Fire and Fang_Fire.Enabled == true then coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and not humanoid.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("DarkFire") then local cFire = Fang_Fire:Clone() cFire.Parent = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") RBX_Debris:AddItem(cFire, 4) if math.random() < 0.25 then local anansi = Anansi:Clone() local aScript = Tool:WaitForChild('AnansiAIScript'):Clone() aScript.Parent = Character aScript:WaitForChild('Anansi').Value = anansi anansi:WaitForChild('Target').Value = humanoid.Parent:WaitForChild('Torso') anansi.Parent = Character aScript.Disabled = false RBX_Debris:AddItem(anansi, 30.0) RBX_Debris:AddItem(aScript, 30.0) anansi:MoveTo(Torso.CFrame.p + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 4.0, Torso) end local duration = 4 while duration > 0 do humanoid:TakeDamage(3) duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end end end)) end end end end
local function OnEquipped() if Fang_Weld then Fang_Weld.Parent = Tool end Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Sword.Touched:connect(Cut)
local function FireSpiderCannon() local parts_List = {}
local ray = Instance.new("Part") ray.Parent = game.Workspace ray.FormFactor = 3 ray.Anchored = true ray.CanCollide = false ray.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.2, 1) ray.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic ray.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") ray.Locked = true ray.CFrame = CFrame.new(Fire_Part.CFrame.p, Vector3.new(0, 1, 0))
while ray.Size.Y < 100 do ray.Size = ray.Size * Vector3.new(1, 2, 1) ray.CFrame = CFrame.new(Fire_Part.CFrame.p) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -ray.Size/2) wait(0.05) end
for i = 1, 8 do local p = Instance.new('Part') p.Parent = Game.Workspace p.FormFactor = 3 p.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) p.CFrame = ray.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 2*i*math.pi/8) p.Anchored = true p.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Black') p.CanCollide = false
table.insert(parts_List, p) end
local duration = 3.0 while duration > 0 do local count = 0 for _, part in pairs(parts_List) do count = count + 1 if part.Size.Y < 30 then part.Size = part.Size + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) part.CFrame = (ray.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, ray.Size.Y/2, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, count * math.pi/8) end end wait() duration = duration - wait(0.25) end
wait(1.0) ray:Destroy() for _, part in pairs(parts_List) do print('Anansi!') local anansi = Anansi:Clone() local aScript = Tool:WaitForChild('AnansiAIScript'):Clone() aScript:WaitForChild('Anansi').Value = anansi anansi.Parent = Character aScript.Parent = Character aScript.Disabled = false anansi:MoveTo(part.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(math.random(1, 5), 0, math.random(1, 5)), Torso) RBX_Debris:AddItem(anansi, 30.0) RBX_Debris:AddItem(aScript, 30.0) part:Destroy() wait() end end
Fanged_BoolValue.Changed:connect(function() if Fanged_BoolValue.Value == true and Humanoid then Fang_Fire.Enabled = true Damage = 29 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 FireSpiderCannon() Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 21.0 wait(30) Damage = 16 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 Fang_Fire.Enabled = false wait(15) Fanged_BoolValue.Value = false else if not Humanoid then if Fanged_BoolValue then Fanged_BoolValue.Value = false end end end end)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Slash_Animation local Stab_Animation local Darken_Animation
local Charge_Animation
local Slash_Sound
local MouseDown_Bool = false
local Camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local Darken_BoolValue local Animating_Bool = false
local function CountAnansi() local nAnansi = 0 for _, child in pairs(vCharacter:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('Model') and child.Name == 'Anansi' then nAnansi = nAnansi + 1 end end return nAnansi end
local function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Animating_Bool == false then MouseDown_Bool = true Charge_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ChargeAnim) Charge_Animation:Play() local currentSpeed = vHumanoid.WalkSpeed while MouseDown_Bool do vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = math.min(vHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 0.1, 23) wait() end if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end local vDirection = (vTorso.Position - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit local mDirection = (vHumanoid.TargetPoint - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit
local angleBetweenVectors = math.abs(math.acos(vDirection:Dot(mDirection))) if angleBetweenVectors < 0.5 then Slash_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) Slash_Animation:Play() else Stab_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StabAnim) Stab_Animation:Play() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -1.75, 0, 0.99999994, 0, -0, 0, -0.691990137, -0.72190702, -0, 0.72190702, -0.691990137) wait(1.3) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.20000005, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) end vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = currentSpeed else end end)
mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown_Bool = false if Animating_Bool == false then Tool.Enabled = false Animating_Bool = true wait(1.5) Tool.Enabled = true Animating_Bool = false end end)
mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then Darken_BoolValue = Tool:FindFirstChild("Fanged") if Darken_BoolValue and Darken_BoolValue.Value == false and CountAnansi() < 4 then Animating_Bool = true Darken_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DarkenAnim) Darken_Animation:Play() wait(0.4) vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 Darken_BoolValue.Value = true wait(2.0) Animating_Bool = false end end end) end
local function onUnequipped() -- Do stuff if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end if Slash_Animation then Slash_Animation:Stop() end if Stab_Animation then Stab_Animation:Stop() end if Darken_Animation then Darken_Animation:Stop() end Animating_Bool = false Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.20000005, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) MouseDown_Bool = false vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

while script:FindFirstChild("Anansi") == nil do wait() end
local petAnansi = script.Anansi
while petAnansi.Value == nil do wait() end
petAnansi = petAnansi.Value
while petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Target") == nil do wait() end
print(0.1)
local target = petAnansi.Target
local targetEnemyTorso
if target.Value == nil then --petAnansi:Remove() end
-- Best part about doing this from the character local vCharacter = script.Parent local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local petAnansiHumanoid = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local petAnansiTorso = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local enemyHumanoid = target.Value
if petAnansiHumanoid then petAnansiHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 18.0
while petAnansiHumanoid.MaxHealth < 150 do petAnansiHumanoid.MaxHealth = 150 wait() end
while petAnansiHumanoid.Health < 150 do petAnansiHumanoid.Health = 150 wait() end
petAnansiHumanoid.Died:connect(function() petAnansi:Destroy() script:Destroy() end) end
print(0.2)
local healCount = 0
function slash(hit) if hit and not hit:IsA('Terrain') and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.Name ~= 'Anansi' then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= petAnansiHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) if humanoid.Health == 0 then targetEnemyTorso = nil followCharacter = true else end end end end
local petAnansiLeftArm = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local petAnansiRightArm = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") --[[local petAnansiRightMidArm = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Right MidArm") local petAnansiLeftMidArm = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Left MidArm") local petAnansiLeftForeArm = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Left ForeArm") local petAnansiRightForeArm = petAnansi:FindFirstChild("Right ForeArm")]]
if petAnansiLeftArm then petAnansiLeftArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petAnansiRightArm then petAnansiRightArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
--[[if petAnansiLeftForeArm then petAnansiLeftForeArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petAnansiRightForeArm then petAnansiRightForeArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petAnansiRightMidArm then petAnansiRightMidArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petAnansiLeftMidArm then petAnansiLeftMidArm.Touched:connect(slash) end ]]
local petAnansiHead = petAnansi:FindFirstChild('Head') if petAnansiHead then petAnansiHead.Touched:connect(slash) end
print(0.4)
petAnansiTorso.Touched:connect(slash)
local children = petAnansi:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i].ClassName == "Tool" then if children[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then children[i].Handle.Touched:connect(slash) end end end
local targetEnemy if enemyHumanoid then targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent end
if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") targetEnemyHumanoid = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if targetEnemyTorso == nil then --petAnansi:Remove() end else --petAnansi:Remove() end
target.Changed:connect(function() if target.Value then enemyHumanoid = target.Value targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") end end end)
local animating = false
local checkAOE = Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)
local function FindNearestTorso() local parts = Game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(petAnansiTorso.Position - checkAOE, petAnansiTorso.Position + checkAOE), vCharacter, 100) for _, part in pairs(parts) do if part and part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') then return part.Parent['Torso'], part.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end end end
print(0.45)
local duration = 30
while duration > 0 do local ray = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(petAnansiHead.Position, petAnansiHead.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0), petAnansi) if ray and petAnansiHumanoid and ray.Parent ~= petAnansi and ray.Parent ~= vCharacter and ray.Parent.Name == 'Anansi' then petAnansiHumanoid.Jump = true end if targetEnemyTorso and targetEnemyHumanoid and targetEnemyHumanoid.Health > 0 then local distance = (targetEnemyTorso.Position - petAnansiTorso.Position).magnitude local targetEnemy = targetEnemyTorso.Parent if distance < 60 then petAnansiHumanoid:MoveTo(targetEnemyTorso.Position, targetEnemyTorso) if distance < 4 and not animating then animating = true local biteAnim = petAnansiHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script:FindFirstChild("BiteAnim")) if biteAnim then biteAnim:Play() end coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(1.25) animating = false end)) end else if myTorso then petAnansiHumanoid:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(4, 0, 4), myTorso) end end else targetEnemyTorso, targetEnemyHumanoid = FindNearestTorso() if not targetEnemyHumanoid or targetEnemyHumanoid.Health == 0 then targetEnemyTorso = nil end if not targetEnemyTorso and myTorso then petAnansiHumanoid:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(4, 0, 4), myTorso) end end wait(0.1) duration = duration - wait(0.1) end
petAnansi:Destroy() script:Destroy()
